short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts information from the user's browsing history and creates a personalized profile based on his/her insterests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UxExtension provides a mechanism to extract the user's interests, based on his browsing history. To enjoy a personalized User Experience, the user is advised to use messenger's UXbot that utilizes the extracted information and provides the user with a personalized news feed.
